mean_en: to end or cancel (something) in a formal and official way
word_etyma: ab去掉 + rog要求,问 + ate动词后缀 → 不再要求有 → abrogate 取消，废除
short_phrase: a stamp to abrogate sb.'s privileges
sentence: We hereby abrogate your library privileges because you write in all the books.
sentence_trans: 我们在此废除你的图书馆特权，因为你在书上涂写。
